name: GemStripes
description:
Look for matching color blocks, wisely use bonuses. Many levels are designed not only for attention, but also for the player's reaction. Fast and short sessions will not let you get bored.
The game has a large number of levels with different game conditions. Can you beat all the levels for a gold medal?

-Logic or speed game levels
-Match three or more blocks in a row with the same color or using special bonuses
-Colorful graphics
-Dynamic gameplay
-Different difficulty levels
